sentences.en: A cool breeze made the heat pleasantly bearable.
sentences.cn: 一阵凉风吹来，让炎热的天气变得稍微舒适了一些。

sentences.en: A gust of breeze moved down the hillside, ruffling the grass.
sentences.cn: 一阵微风吹下山坡，使青草如波浪起伏。

sentences.en: A slight breeze rose, wafting the heavy scent of flowers past her.
sentences.cn: 清风吹拂，浓郁的花香向她飘来。

sentences.en: Making the pastry is a breeze if you have a food processor.
sentences.cn: 如果你有食品加工机，做这种点心轻而易举。

sentences.en: Outside the breeze was fresh and from the north.
sentences.cn: 外面凉飕飕的微风从北面吹来。

sentences.en: Palm trees stir in the soft Pacific breeze.
sentences.cn: 棕榈树在太平洋和煦的微风中轻轻地摇动。

sentences.en: The breeze grew in strength, the flags shook, plastic bunting creaked.
sentences.cn: 微风渐强，旗帜舞动起来，塑料彩纸吱吱作响。

sentences.en: The breeze was cool, brisk and invigorating.
sentences.cn: 微风凉爽、清新，令人精神振奋。

sentences.en: The curtains billowed in the breeze.
sentences.cn: 微风吹得窗帘鼓了起来。

sentences.en: The flowers were gently swaying in the breeze .
sentences.cn: 花儿在微风中轻轻舞动。

sentences.en: The little sailing-boat moved briskly along, heeling over under a nice breeze.
sentences.cn: 小帆船在和风中倾侧着轻快地向前开。

sentences.en: the sound of the trees rustling in the breeze
sentences.cn: 树木在微风中发出的沙沙声

sentences.en: The tops of the trees rippled in the breeze.
sentences.cn: 树冠在微风中婆娑摇曳。

sentences.en: There was a short sharp shower followed by a strengthening breeze.
sentences.cn: 一场短时强阵雨后风势渐长。

words.tran_cn: 有微风的；轻松愉快的；通风好的；活泼的
吹微风地；通风地；轻松活泼地

phrases.tran_cn: 轻而易举地取胜；象一阵风似地来到

trans.tran_cn: 漫步走入，轻松通过（比赛或测试）

trans.tran_en: to walk somewhere in a calm confident way
